code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import api from'../api';import'./Users.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Users=()=>{const[users,setUsers]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const loadUsers=async()=>{try{const response=await api.get('/users');setUsers(response.data);}catch(err){setError('Failed to load users.');}finally{setLoading(false);}};loadUsers();},[]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"users-container",children:"Loading users..."});if(error)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"users-container",children:error});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"users-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Users"}),users.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No users found."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"users-list",children:users.map(user=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[user.name," (",user.email,")"]},user.id))})]});};export default Users;
